text: :  . ,  . Entering and systematically updating date in VMS/VAMS/PAMS/iLogistics systems, including but not limited to the following. Arranging temporary/permanent access to facilities, arranging trips for Contractor employees. Monitoring Contractor employees in issues of employees/vehicles project mobilization, related to VMS/VAMS/PAMS/iLogistics systems. Submitting reports on the status of providing employees/vehicles badges at the request of customers. Contributing to the improvement of all working processes of FGP Mobilization Department. Performing miscellaneous assignment from the mangers. Full cycle of Tengiz mobilization/demobilization arrangements. DASH-8 flight/bus/train/accommodation reservations for Tengiz employees. Trainings enrollment for newcomers and Tengiz employees. Coordinates Atyrau logistics and Hotel booking. Submits IT remedy requests. Submits JD E1 requests for creation of profile system. : work experience more than 3 years. : Karabatan 28/28. MS AccessMS PowerPointDriving Licence B.

{"document_id": "Kaggle::techmap::61520a6a102bf347cba64982::headhunter_kz", "source": "headhunter_kz", "country": "KZ", "company": "Консорциум Isker", "position": "Mobilization Coordinator", "notes": "", "original": "

Требуемый опыт работы: не требуется

Полная занятость, полный день

Обязанности:

* Entering and systematically updating date in VMS/VAMS/PAMS/iLogistics systems, including but not limited to the following
* Arranging temporary/permanent access to facilities, arranging trips for Contractor employees
* Monitoring Contractor employees in issues of employees/vehicles project mobilization, related to VMS/VAMS/PAMS/iLogistics systems
* Submitting reports on the status of providing employees/vehicles badges at the request of customers
* Contributing to the improvement of all working processes of FGP Mobilization Department
* Performing miscellaneous assignment from the mangers
* Full cycle of Tengiz mobilization/demobilization arrangements
* DASH-8 flight/bus/train/accommodation reservations for Tengiz employees.
* Trainings enrollment for newcomers and Tengiz employees
* Coordinates Atyrau logistics and Hotel booking
* Submits IT remedy requests
* Submits JD E1 requests for creation of profile system.


Требования:

  • work experience more than 3 years
Условия:
  • Karabatan 28/28

Ключевые навыки

Работа в команде
Английский язык
MS Access
MS PowerPoint
Driving Licence B
"}
